mapper.select:
select TGB.GUAR_NO -- 보호자_번호 , TGB.GUAR_NO AS GUAR_NO_TEMP -- 보호자_번호_임시 , TPB.PRNT_NO AS PRNT_NO_TEMP -- 학부모_번호_임시 , TGB.GUAR_NM -- 보호자_명 , TBS.GUAR_TEL_NO -- 보호자_전화_번호 , TSB.STDT_NO -- 학생_번호 , TSB.STDT_NM -- 학생_명 , TGB.ENTR_DT -- 가입_일자(보호자) , fn_getCdNm('ENTR_STAT_CD',ENTR_STAT_CD) as ENTR_STAT_CD_NM-- 가입_상태_코드_명 , TGB.ENTR_STAT_CD -- 가입_상태_코드 , TBI.TEL_NO -- 전화_번호(밴드) , TEB.LOC_NM -- 위치_명(학교,학원_명) , TBI.BAND_ID -- 밴드_ID , TPB.PRNT_NO -- 학부모_번호 , TPB.PRNT_NM as PRNT_NM_MALE -- 학부모_명_남자 , TPB2.PRNT_NM as PRNT_NM_FEMALE --학부모_명_여자 from TS_BAND_INFO TBI -- 밴드_정보 inner join TS_BAND_SPEC TBS -- 밴드_상세 on TBI.BAND_ID = TBS.BAND_ID inner join TM_GUAR_BASE TGB -- 보호자_기본 on TBS.GUAR_TEL_NO = TGB.GUAR_TEL_NO left outer join TM_STDT_GUAR_CONN TSGC -- 학생_보호자_연결 on TGB.GUAR_NO = TSGC.GUAR_NO left outer join TM_STDT_BASE TSB -- 학생_기본 on TBI.BAND_ID = TSB.BAND_ID left outer join TI_EORG_BASE TEB -- 교육시설_기본 on TSB.EORG_LOC_NO = TEB.LOC_NO left outer join TM_PRNT_BASE TPB -- 학부모_기본 on TGB.PRNT_NO = TPB.PRNT_NO and TPB.SEX_CD = 'MALE' left outer join TM_PRNT_BASE TPB2 -- 학부모_기본 on TGB.PRNT_NO = TPB2.PRNT_NO and TPB2.SEX_CD = 'FEMALE' WHERE 1=1
and TGB.ENTR_DT between replace(#{entrDtFr},'-','') and replace(#{entrDtTo},'-','')
and TSB.STDT_NO = #{stdtNo}::NUMERIC
and TSB.STDT_NM like CONCAT('%',#{stdtNm},'%')
and TBI.BAND_ID like CONCAT('%',#{bandId},'%')
and TBI.TEL_NO = #{telNo}
and TGB.GUAR_NO = #{guarNo}::NUMERIC
and TGB.GUAR_NM like CONCAT('%',#{guarNm},'%')
and TGB.GUAR_TEL_NO = #{guarTelNo}
and TEB.LOC_NM like CONCAT('%',#{locNm},'%') group by TGB.GUAR_NO, TBS.GUAR_TEL_NO, TBI.BAND_ID, TSB.STDT_NO, TEB.LOC_NM, TPB.PRNT_NO, TPB.PRNT_NM, TPB2.PRNT_NM order by ENTR_STAT_CD_NM, TGB.GUAR_NO, TGB.GUAR_NM, TSB.STDT_NO, TGB.ENTR_DT, TEB.LOC_NM, TBI.BAND_ID
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
mapper.insert:
select nextval('absv.tm_guar_base_seq')
INSERT INTO TM_GUAR_BASE ( guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
,guar_nm /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(40) */
,guar_tel_no /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,guar_pw /* guar_pw 보호자_비밀번호 character varying(400) */
,self_cert_dttm /* self_cert_dttm 본인_인증_일시 character(14) */
,auto_login_yn /* auto_login_yn 자동_로그인_여부 character(1) */
,devc_cert_val /* devc_cert_val 장치_인증_값 character varying(1000) */
,fcm_tokn_val /* fcm_tokn_val FCM_토큰_값 character varying(100) */
,dzone_alam_yn /* dzone_alam_yn 위험지역_알림_여부 character(1) */
,prnt_no /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */
,szone_alam_yn /* szone_alam_yn 세이프존_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,fall_alam_yn /* fall_alam_yn 낙상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,hbit_abnm_alam_yn /* hbit_abnm_alam_yn 심박_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,temp_abnm_alam_yn /* temp_abnm_alam_yn 체온_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,body_hist_alam_yn /* body_hist_alam_yn 신체_기록_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,meal_ninp_alam_yn /* meal_ninp_alam_yn 식사_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,excs_ninp_alam_yn /* excs_ninp_alam_yn 운동_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,cbee_use_alam_yn /* cbee_use_alam_yn 캐시비_사용_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,batr_lack_alam_yn /* batr_lack_alam_yn 배터리_부족_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,ltrm_nuse_alam_yn /* ltrm_nuse_alam_yn 장기_미사용_알림_여부 character(1) */
,entr_dt /* entr_dt 가입_일자 character(8) */
,rels_dt /* rels_dt 해지_일자 character(8) */
,rels_resn_cd /* rels_resn_cd 해지_사유_코드 character varying(20) */
,rels_resn_cntn /* rels_resn_cntn 해지_사유_내용 character varying(4000) */
,entr_stat_cd /* entr_stat_cd 가입_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
,#{guarNm} /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(40) */
,#{guarTelNo} /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,#{guarPw} /* guar_pw 보호자_비밀번호 character varying(400) */
,#{selfCertDttm} /* self_cert_dttm 본인_인증_일시 character(14) */
,#{autoLoginYn} /* auto_login_yn 자동_로그인_여부 character(1) */
,#{devcCertVal} /* devc_cert_val 장치_인증_값 character varying(1000) */
,#{fcmToknVal} /* fcm_tokn_val FCM_토큰_값 character varying(100) */
,#{dzoneAlamYn} /* dzone_alam_yn 위험지역_알림_여부 character(1) */
,#{prntNo}::NUMERIC /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */
,#{szoneAlamYn} /* szone_alam_yn 세이프존_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{fallAlamYn} /* fall_alam_yn 낙상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{hbitAbnmAlamYn} /* hbit_abnm_alam_yn 심박_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{tempAbnmAlamYn} /* temp_abnm_alam_yn 체온_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{bodyHistAlamYn} /* body_hist_alam_yn 신체_기록_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{mealNinpAlamYn} /* meal_ninp_alam_yn 식사_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{excsNinpAlamYn} /* excs_ninp_alam_yn 운동_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{cbeeUseAlamYn} /* cbee_use_alam_yn 캐시비_사용_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{batrLackAlamYn} /* batr_lack_alam_yn 배터리_부족_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{ltrmNuseAlamYn} /* ltrm_nuse_alam_yn 장기_미사용_알림_여부 character(1) */
,replace(#{entrDt},'-','') /* entr_dt 가입_일자 character(8) */
,replace(#{relsDt},'-','') /* rels_dt 해지_일자 character(8) */
,#{relsResnCd} /* rels_resn_cd 해지_사유_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{relsResnCntn} /* rels_resn_cntn 해지_사유_내용 character varying(4000) */
,#{entrStatCd} /* entr_stat_cd 가입_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
, TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') , #{regUserId} , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') , #{uptUserId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TM_GUAR_BASE SET guar_nm = #{guarNm} /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(40) */ ,guar_tel_no = #{guarTelNo} /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ ,guar_pw = #{guarPw} /* guar_pw 보호자_비밀번호 character varying(400) */ ,self_cert_dttm = #{selfCertDttm} /* self_cert_dttm 본인_인증_일시 character(14) */ ,auto_login_yn = #{autoLoginYn} /* auto_login_yn 자동_로그인_여부 character(1) */
,devc_cert_val = #{devcCertVal} /* devc_cert_val 장치_인증_값 character varying(1000) */
,fcm_tokn_val = #{fcmToknVal} /* fcm_tokn_val FCM_토큰_값 character varying(100) */
,dzone_alam_yn = #{dzoneAlamYn} /* dzone_alam_yn 위험지역_알림_여부 character(1) */
,prnt_no = #{prntNo}::NUMERIC /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */
,szone_alam_yn = #{szoneAlamYn} /* szone_alam_yn 세이프존_알림_여부 character(1) */
,fall_alam_yn = #{fallAlamYn} /* fall_alam_yn 낙상_알림_여부 character(1) */
,hbit_abnm_alam_yn = #{hbitAbnmAlamYn} /* hbit_abnm_alam_yn 심박_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */
,temp_abnm_alam_yn = #{tempAbnmAlamYn} /* temp_abnm_alam_yn 체온_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */
,body_hist_alam_yn = #{bodyHistAlamYn} /* body_hist_alam_yn 신체_기록_알림_여부 character(1) */
,meal_ninp_alam_yn = #{mealNinpAlamYn} /* meal_ninp_alam_yn 식사_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */
,excs_ninp_alam_yn = #{excsNinpAlamYn} /* excs_ninp_alam_yn 운동_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */
,cbee_use_alam_yn = #{cbeeUseAlamYn} /* cbee_use_alam_yn 캐시비_사용_알림_여부 character(1) */
,batr_lack_alam_yn = #{batrLackAlamYn} /* batr_lack_alam_yn 배터리_부족_알림_여부 character(1) */
,ltrm_nuse_alam_yn = #{ltrmNuseAlamYn} /* ltrm_nuse_alam_yn 장기_미사용_알림_여부 character(1) */
,entr_dt = replace(#{entrDt} , '-','') /* entr_dt 가입_일자 character(8) */
,rels_dt = replace(#{relsDt} , '-','') /* rels_dt 해지_일자 character(8) */
,rels_resn_cd = #{relsResnCd} /* rels_resn_cd 해지_사유_코드 character varying(20) */
,rels_resn_cntn = #{relsResnCntn} /* rels_resn_cntn 해지_사유_내용 character varying(4000) */
,entr_stat_cd = #{entrStatCd} /* entr_stat_cd 가입_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,UPT_DT = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') ,UPT_TM = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') ,UPT_USER_ID = #{uptUserId} WHERE 1=1 AND GUAR_NO = #{guarNo}::NUMERIC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TM_GUAR_BASE WHERE 1=1 AND GUAR_NO = #{guarNoTemp}
mapper.select: SELECT TGB.guar_no as guar_no_temp , TSB.stdt_no , TSB.stdt_nm , TGB.guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ , TGB.guar_nm /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(20) */ , TGB.guar_tel_no /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ , TGB.guar_pw /* guar_pw 보호자_비밀번호 character varying(1000) */ , TGB.self_cert_dttm /* self_cert_dttm 본인_인증_일시 character(14) */ , TGB.auto_login_yn /* auto_login_yn 자동_로그인_여부 bpchar(1)*/ , TGB.devc_cert_val /* devc_cert_val 장치_인증_값*/ , TGB.FCM_TOKN_VAL , TGB.prnt_no /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */ , TGB.dzone_alam_yn /* dzone_alam_yn 위험지역_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.szone_alam_yn /* szone_alam_yn 세이프존_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.fall_alam_yn /* fall_alam_yn 낙상_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.hbit_abnm_alam_yn /* hbit_abnm_alam_yn 심박_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.temp_abnm_alam_yn /* temp_abnm_alam_yn 체온_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.body_hist_alam_yn /* body_hist_alam_yn 신체_기록_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.meal_ninp_alam_yn /* meal_noin_alam_yn 식사_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.excs_ninp_alam_yn /* excs_noin_alam_yn 운동_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.cbee_use_alam_yn /* cbee_use_alam_yn 캐시비_사용_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.batr_lack_alam_yn /* batr_lack_alam_yn 배터리_부족_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.ltrm_nuse_alam_yn /* ltrm_nuse_alam_yn 장기_미사용_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.entr_dt /* entr_dt 가입_일자 character(8) */ , TGB.rels_dt /* rels_dt 해지_일자 character(8) */ , TGB.rels_resn_cd /* rels_resn_cd 해지_사유_코드 character varying(20) */ , TGB.rels_resn_cntn /* rels_resn_cntn 해지_사유_내용 character varying(400) */ , TGB.entr_stat_cd /* entr_stat_cd 가입_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ , TGB.reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ , TGB.reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ , TGB.reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ , TGB.upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ , TGB.upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ , TGB.upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tm_guar_base TGB left outer JOIN TM_STDT_GUAR_CONN TSGC on TGB.GUAR_NO = TSGC.GUAR_NO left outer JOIN TM_STDT_BASE TSB on TSGC.STDT_NO = TSB.STDT_NO left outer join ts_band_spec TBS ON TGB.GUAR_TEL_NO = TBS.GUAR_TEL_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND TGB.guar_tel_no = #{guarTelNo} AND TSB.band_id = #{bandId} AND TSB.stdt_no = #{stdtNo}::NUMERIC group by TGB.guar_no ,TSB.stdt_no

select coalesce(TTAD.GUAR_NO, #{guarNo}::NUMERIC ) as GUAR_NO , fn_getCdNm('TERM_DIV_CD',TTB.TERM_DIV_CD) as TERM_DIV_CD_NM , TTB.TERM_DIV_CD , TTB.TERM_VER , coalesce(TTAD.TERM_AGRE_YN , 'N') as TERM_AGRE_YN , TTAD.TERM_AGRE_DTTM from TI_TERM_BASE TTB LEFT outer join TM_TERM_AGRE_DETL TTAD on TTB.TERM_DIV_CD = TTAD.TERM_DIV_CD and TTAD.GUAR_NO = #{guarNo}::NUMERIC where 1=1 order by TTB.TERM_VER,TERM_DIV_CD_NM, TTAD.TERM_AGRE_DTTM
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}

select b.spos_no , a.guar_no from tm_guar_base a inner join tm_spos_base b on b.spos_no = a.spos_no inner join ts_band_info c on (a.guar_tel_no = c.guar_tel_no_1 or a.guar_tel_no = c.guar_tel_no_2) and c.band_open_stat_cd = 'NORM' where 1 = 1 and a.entr_stat_cd != '90' -- 해제 and a.rels_dt is null and a.rels_resn_cd is null and exists(select 1 from ts_band_info x inner join tm_guar_base y on (y.guar_tel_no = x.guar_tel_no_1 or y.guar_tel_no = x.guar_tel_no_2) and y.entr_stat_cd != '90' -- 해제 and y.rels_dt is null and y.rels_resn_cd is null where x.band_open_stat_cd = 'NORM' and c.band_id = x.band_id and y.guar_no = ${guarNo}::NUMERIC) and a.guar_no != ${guarNo}::NUMERIC

select a.guar_no from TM_GUAR_BASE a inner join TM_SPOS_BASE b on a.SPOS_NO = b.SPOS_NO inner join ts_band_info c on (a.guar_tel_no = c.guar_tel_no_1 or a.guar_tel_no = c.guar_tel_no_2) and c.band_open_stat_cd = 'NORM' where 1=1 and exists(select 1 from ts_band_info x inner join tm_guar_base y on (y.guar_tel_no = x.guar_tel_no_1 or y.guar_tel_no = x.guar_tel_no_2) and y.entr_stat_cd != '90' -- 해제 and y.rels_dt is null and y.rels_resn_cd is null where x.band_open_stat_cd = 'NORM' and c.band_id = x.band_id and y.guar_no = ${guarNo}::NUMERIC) and a.guar_no != ${guarNo}::NUMERIC
